alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham; Interior Rockingham; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 2:51PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern York, Rockingham and southeastern Strafford Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 251 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Barrington to Epping to near Derry. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Derry, Rochester, Portsmouth, Hampton, Durham, Exeter, Kittery, Salem, Dover, Somersworth, Barrington, Berwick, Farmington, Epping, Lebanon, Brentwood, Greenland, Newington, Seabrook and Wells. This includes the following highways... Interstate 93 between mile markers 8 and 12. Interstate 95 between mile markers 1 and 20. Interstate 95 in New Hampshire between mile markers 0 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
